text: Rok pierwszy is a 1960 Polish drama film directed by Witold Lesiewicz. ==Cast== * Stanisław Zaczyk as sierzant Lukasz Otryna * Leszek Herdegen as kapral Józef Dunajec * Aleksandra Śląska as Dorota ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 films Category:1960 drama films Category:Polish films Category:Polish drama films Category:Polish black-and-white films Category:Polish-language films Category:Films directed by Witold Lesiewicz
title: Rok pierwszy
